pageContext.claim: “So, President Obama left Mitch and me and Rand, and all of us, he left 142 openings to the judges. You're not supposed to allow any....So, Mitch and I, and Rand would like to thank very much, President Obama, because nobody has ever been so generous than him.”
pageContext.analysis: There were 103 vacancies on the federal courts when Trump took office -- not through Obama's lack of effort. Senate Republicans refused to move on his nominations.
